2462: This entire policy will be void and all coverages forfeited, and payment will not be made to any insured, if before or after a loss, any insured has: 1. intentionally concealed or misrepresented any material fact or circumstance; 2. engaged in fraudulent conduct; or 3. made false statements; relating to this insurance, the insurance application, the loss, the presentation of the claim or any other fact or circumstance mate
